feed.title: Journal of the SVDSA
feed.subtitle: News and updates for the peninsula, Bay Area, and beyond.

entry.title: Upcoming Meeting: Tuesday, April 25
entry.content:
Sorry for the shorter notice this time, but: there’s a meeting tomorrow! Our agenda this time will include hearing from our teams focusing on:

  • Health care for all
  • A recap of the March for Science
  • Our ongoing organization efforts for May Day
  • Our communication best practices, including how this blog should work!

When: Tuesday, April 25, 2017, 6:30 PM to 8 PM. (6 PM if you want to hear the first-timer welcome routine!)

Where: Redwood City Downtown Library
Community Room
1044 Middlefield Road
Redwood City, CA 94063

View on Google Maps

New to SVDSA? Show up at 6 PM! We’re holding a first-timers orientation then; you’ll be up to speed in no time!
entry.summary: Sorry for the shorter notice this time, but: there’s a meeting tomorrow! Our agenda this time will include hearing from our teams focusing on:

entry.title: Upcoming Meeting: Tuesday, April 11
entry.content:
We got another meeting! Oh yeah!!!

When:
Tuesday, April 11, 2017, 6:30 PM to 8 PM. (6 PM if you want to hear the first-timer welcome routine!)

Where:
Mountain View Community Center
201 S Rengstorff Ave.
Mountain View, CA 94040

We’ll be in Room Two.

View on Google Maps

New to SVDSA? Show up at 6 PM! We’re holding a first-timers orientation then; you’ll be up to speed in no time!

RSVP: If you wouldn’t mind, let us know you’re coming by filling in an RSVP form. (Not required! Just nice for us to know in advance.)
entry.summary: We got another meeting! Oh yeah!!!

entry.title: Upcoming Meeting: Saturday, March 18
entry.content:
Our next meeting is coming Saturday, March 18, from 1 PM to 3 PM. On the agenda:

  • Introducing a Coordination Committee: What should it do? Who should it be? How should it work? Come cast your vote!
  • Get the latest updates on canvassing
  • Reports from some of our task forces, including: flood relief efforts; mid-Peninsula organizing; social media; and Menlo Park’s City Council joining vs. Trump.

First timer? We’ll have a dedicated 15 minute orientation to help get you up to speed.

Veteran member? We’ll discuss some proposed structural changes regarding how the South Bay DSA is organized.

When:
Saturday, March 18, 1 PM to 3 PM.

Where:
All Saints Episcopal Church
555 Waverley St.
Palo Alto, CA 94301

View on Google Maps
entry.summary: Our next meeting is coming Saturday, March 18, from 1 PM to 3 PM. On the agenda:

entry.title: Upcoming Events, Mar 4 through Mar 10
entry.content:
Here’s a set of events coming up this week:

Saturday, March 4

Town Hall with Rep. Anna Eshoo (CA-18)
10:00 to 11:30 AM
Campbell Heritage Theater
1 West Campbell Avenue
Campbell, CA 95008

Rise Up For Justice
Planning for International Women’s Day and May Day events.
3:00 PM
San Jose Peace & Justice Center
48 S 7th St # 101
San Jose, CA 95112
RU4J’s Facebook

Sunday, March 5

“Here’s What You Can Do” Activist Summit
Held by Rep. Eshoo’s campaign
2:00 to 5:00 PM
Crown Plaza Cabana
4290 El Camino Real
Palo Alto, CA 94306
RSVP Link

TechSolidarity Meeting
7:00 to 9:00 PM
Muslim Community Association
3003 Scott Blvd.
Santa Clara, CA 95054

Tuesday, March 7

“Target Iran” forum
With Prof. Ali Ferdowski of Notre Dame
7:00 PM
Midpen Media Center 900 San Antonio Rd.
Palo Alto, CA 94303
RSVP to save a seat

Tech Workers Coalition Meeting
7:00 to 8:30 PM
Unite Here! Local 2
209 Golden Gate Ave.
San Francisco, CA 94102

Wednesday, March 8

International Women’s Strike

Thursday, March 9

District Office Open House
Meet with State Sen. Jerry Hill (SD-13) and Assemblyperson Kevin Mullin (AD-22)
4:00 to 6:00 PM
1528 South El Camino Real, Suites 302 and 303
San Mateo, CA 94402
RSVP here or here

Friday, March 10

Movie Screening: “Now Is The Time”
Watch a movie about single payer health care alongside the filmmakers.
6:00 to 8:00 PM
Low Income Self-Help Center
525 W Alma Ave.
San Jose, CA 95125

If you’re hitting up any of these, let us know on Twitter or Facebook!

entry.title: Upcoming General Meeting: Thursday, March 2
entry.content:
We’re back again, getting together for another general meeting! On the agenda:

  • Momentum on single payer for California
  • Expanding outreach into our communities
  • Responding to San Jose’s floods
  • Anything you’d like to discuss!

When:
Thursday, March 2, 6 PM.

Where:
All Saints Episcopal Church
555 Waverley St.
Palo Alto, CA 94301

View on Google Maps

entry.title: General Meeting Survey
entry.content:
The SVDSA is ready to put together a schedule of General Meetings! These would be regular events, probably 60 to 90 minutes, likely held twice per month. We’d hear from members reporting back from recent events, and work together on new events for the future. Good old fashioned organization stuff.

To try and narrow down a time and place for these meetings, we’ve put together a short survey to get your feedback on when and where works for the most people.

Click here to take the survey.
entry.summary: The SVDSA is ready to put together a schedule of General Meetings! These would be regular events, probably 60 to 90 minutes, likely held twice per month. We’d hear from members reporting back from recent events, and work together on new events for the future. Good old fashioned organization stuff.
